Package simu.model

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
simu.model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Represents a customer in the cafeteria simulation. Each customer has attributes such as meal type, payment preference, and coffee preference. Tracks timing information for statistics collection.

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer()
      Constructs a new Customer instance. Assigns arrival time, unique ID, and randomly assigns meal type, payment type, and coffee preference based on predefined probabilities.

  • Method Details

    • markServiceStart

      public void markServiceStart(ServicePointType type, double time)
      Marks the start of service at a specific service point.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of service point where service started
      time - The simulation time when service started

    • markServiceEnd

      public void markServiceEnd(ServicePointType type, double time)
      Marks the end of service at a specific service point.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of service point where service ended
      time - The simulation time when service ended

    • addWaitTime

      public void addWaitTime(ServicePointType type, double time)
      Records wait time at a specific service point.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of service point where waiting occurred
      time - The wait time in seconds

    • isWantsCoffee

      public boolean isWantsCoffee()
      Checks if the customer wants coffee. If not yet determined, randomly assigns the preference.
      Returns:
      true if customer wants coffee, false otherwise

    • getMealType

      public MealType getMealType()
      Gets the meal type for this customer.
      Returns:
      The MealType assigned to this customer

    • getPaymentType

      public PaymentType getPaymentType()
      Gets the payment type for this customer.
      Returns:
      The PaymentType assigned to this customer

    • getRemovalTime

      public double getRemovalTime()
      Gets the removal time (exit time) for this customer.
      Returns:
      The simulation time when the customer left the system

    • setRemovalTime

      public void setRemovalTime(double removalTime)
      Sets the removal time (exit time) for this customer.
      Parameters:
      removalTime - The simulation time when the customer left the system

    • getArrivalTime

      public double getArrivalTime()
      Gets the arrival time for this customer.
      Returns:
      The simulation time when the customer arrived

    • setArrivalTime

      public void setArrivalTime(double arrivalTime)
      Sets the arrival time for this customer.
      Parameters:
      arrivalTime - The simulation time when the customer arrived

    • reportResults

      public void reportResults()
      Reports the results for this customer to the trace output. Calculates and displays arrival time, removal time, and total time in system. Also updates the running mean of customer service times.

    • reset

      public static void reset()
      Resets the static customer counters. Used when starting a new simulation to reset customer ID generation and accumulated statistics.
